mapper.sql: select a.seq, a.payment_amount, a.delYN, b.date, b.start_time, b.end_time, c.movie_name, d.location_cinema_name, e.theater_number, e.cinema_type, a.seat_name, g.name from ticketing_detail a join running_time b on b.seq = a.running_time_seq join movie c on c.seq = b.movie_seq join cinema_theater e on e.seq = b.cinema_theater_seq join cinema_name d on d.seq = e.cinema_name_seq join member g on g.seq = a.member_seq where a.delYN =0
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) from ticketing_detail a join running_time b on b.seq = a.running_time_seq join movie c on c.seq = b.movie_seq join cinema_theater e on e.seq = b.cinema_theater_seq join cinema_name d on d.seq = e.cinema_name_seq join member g on g.seq = a.member_seq where a.delYN =0

select a.seq, a.seat_remain, a.start_time, c.theater_number, c.cinema_type, c.seat_count from running_time a join movie b on b.seq = a.movie_seq join cinema_theater c on c.seq = a.cinema_theater_seq join cinema_name d on d.seq = c.cinema_name_seq join cinema e on e.seq = d.cinema_seq WHERE 1=1 and movie_name = #{movie_name} and cinema_type = #{cinema_type} and location_cinema_name = #{location_cinema_name} and date = #{date} and a.delYN =0;

select DISTINCT e.location
from running_time a join movie b on b.seq = a.movie_seq join cinema_theater c on c.seq = a.cinema_theater_seq join cinema_name d on d.seq = c.cinema_name_seq join cinema e on e.seq = d.cinema_seq WHERE 1=1 and movie_name = #{movie_name} and cinema_type = #{cinema_type} and a.delYN=0;

select DISTINCT
b.movie_name, b.view_age
from running_time a join movie b on b.seq = a.movie_seq join cinema_theater c on c.seq = a.cinema_theater_seq join cinema_name d on d.seq = c.cinema_name_seq
WHERE a.delYN = 0;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ticketing_detail ( payment_amount, seat_name, member_seq, running_time_seq, delYN ) VALUE ( #{payment_amount}, #{seat_name}, #{member_seq}, #{running_time_seq}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE ticketing_detail SET delYN = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
